A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm stunned at how bad this was.  Plot holes galore.  Bad cheesy jokes.  Pointless storylines .  It all just makes me sad. How the hell did Disney green light Ithis?  Did the writer/director even watch the first 7 movies?  Does he understand the core of the story at all?   I'll give it a half star for looking good but that's it.  Nothing else about this movie is good.  Seems like it was designed to sell toys and that's it.  Really really disappointed.
